name: GUndone
description:
This is a simple top down shooter prototype, but things start to randomize every time something dies. This is my first game jam game, and I put it together entirely on my own. It is very unfinished and unpolished, but I gave the best attempt I could.

Thanks to Arks for Dunjo Tileset & Sprites, as well as Daniel Soundsgood on the Unity Asset store for the free gun SFX.

Everything else was made by yours truly. I hope you have fun with this goofy little prototype, and maybe I can make it into something more polished in the future
